1.title: No-one's Safe
1.plot: Week 1 sees a new team member, an understudy, shed loads of arguments and performances to remember at the competition - but will the first episode in this season end with winning performances!?

2.title: Our Team Is Falling Apart
2.plot: Week 1 wasn't a good start for the team at competition, so the heat is on - and Jen is grabbing the bull by the horns by bringing in her reserve team. There's also a new teacher and dance school on the block - Debbie Barrass and 'Team DB'. It's clear they're going to be serious competition to the Jennifer Ellison Dance Team this season. Tensions are running high but who will come out on top?

3.title: Bring It On
3.plot: The JEDT are competing in Liverpool this week so there's a lot to prove on home turf - plus Debbie Barrass and Team DB are competing too. Charlotte and Sam are back and it's commercial week - Sam's favourite style - but it's not all plain sailing as Jen brings in choreographer Craig Wharmby who adds his daughter to the group number. It's the Jennifer Ellison Dance Team vs Team DB at the competition. Who will come out on top?

4.title: Never Again Are We Doing Six Solos and a Group
4.plot: Have Jen and the team bitten off more than they can chew this week with six solos and a group dance to put together in three days? The rivalry between the JEDT and Team DB reaches fever pitch as Debbie brings in a secret weapon. And in a week where little Aleah surprises everyone, who will come out on top at the competition, JEDT or Team DB?

5.title: You All Need to Realise the Opportunities I Can Give You
5.plot: This week begins with a shocking piece of news about last week's competition that ends with Danielle being banned from this week's competition. Singer Nadia Forde picks one of the girls to feature in her latest pop video and Jen reveals a big prize on offer for the best dancer this season. At competition this week, there's just one dance; one shot for first place and with a dancer borrowed from Team DB, can they do it?

6.title: It's Dog Eat Dog in the World of Competitive Dance
6.plot: Jealousy is rearing its ugly head again - or is it!? Depends who you listen to. To rebuild the team Serena organises a dance session for the mums. Team DB is back at this week's competition and they're not holding back. Who will be walking away with all the silverware? Let's just say Jen and the team are shocked by the results!

7.title: I Wasn't Prepared for This
7.plot: Still reeling from last week's results, Jen decides to get a second opinion and calls in an independent judge to see how they think her girls should have placed. Tayluer is missing from the team this week so Jen brings in reinforcements - new girl Shevaun and Chloe Senior from Season 1 - and her mum Carol. Danielle throws a party in the gallery but how long will the party spirit last? At the competition how will the solos and group dance place this week?

8.title: It's the End of an Era, Kid
8.plot: Bring on an epic end to Season 2! A former team member returns with a secret weapon that surprises everyone, Charlotte and Sam make a difficult, and very sad decision, and who will win the Capezio prize? There are tears of sadness and tears of joy in a season finale you'll never forget!

0.title: Dance Mums: Abby Meets Jennifer
0.plot: Prepare yourself for fireworks! In the lead up to our brand new series, Dance Mums with Jennifer Ellison, Abby Lee Miller the star of hit US series Dance Moms, travels to the UK to teach Jennifer Ellison some tricks of the competitive dance world and show her how it's done, stateside. There are tears of joy when Abby walks in to surprise the UK mums and girls. They love Abby, but will they love her by the end of the day? Abby immediately gets to work - putting the girls through their paces, testing them, finding their strengths and their weaknesses and seeing if ...

1.title: It All Starts Here
1.plot: It's week one of the eight-week competition season for Jennifer Ellison's brand new dance team. She's personally selected these girls and their mums from her home town of Liverpool and they'd better deliver, it's Jen's name and reputation on the line!

2.title: It's All Kicking Off
2.plot: It's all kicking off this week as the mums lose their cool causing Jen to impose some new rules. With everything spinning out of control it's not looking good for this week's competition on home turf. How will the girls fair against their local rival dance-schools.

3.title: One Man Down: Crisis Auditions
3.plot: Following last week's shock outburst, Chloe Snr and her mum are excluded and auditions are held to find a replacement. After missing a rehearsal Sam is pulled from her duet and with last week's terrible results still fresh in their minds, the girls must step up to the mark.

4.title: The Wheels Fall Off
4.plot: After last week's success in Glasgow things were looking up, but not for long! Chloe Snr is back with her Nana Linda but with meltdowns, forgotten routines, broken rules and a trip to casualty for one of the girls, she returns to a studio on the edge.

5.title: Welcome to the Madhouse
5.plot: Jen declares this week as 'Street Dance' week even though the competition is a very straight-laced and posh affair. How will the controversial routine go down with the upper classes? And to top it off, Jen announces a new addition to the team.

6.title: Bring in the Boys
6.plot: Jen decides to mix things up by bringing in two boys, Jack and Adam but their mums are not welcomed with open arms. It's solo challenge week and everyone will be dancing the same routine, but only one can dance at the competition - and it's up to the mums to decide who!

7.title: Everyone's Time to Shine
7.plot: There's only one week to go before the team travel to Portugal for the Dance World Cup. Focusing on each of the girls' individual skills everyone is given a solo and the chance to shine, an opportunity that allows Aleah to prove herself.

8.title: It's the Dance World Cup
8.plot: This is it, it's the Dance World Cup and for the girls and their mums it doesn't get any bigger than this! Chloe Snr's commitment is questioned when she's late for rehearsal and the pressure is on for a nervous Chloe Jnr as she prepares for her solo performance. With 18,000 performers, will the girls bring home the medals?

imdb.title: Dance Mums
plot: _Dance Mums_ (qv) is a reality television series that follows Jennifer Ellison, the owner of Jelli Studios in Liverpool, England, as she coaches young dancers in the dance and show business. It is a spin-off of the American TV series Dance Moms.
